Slap your choice of [Zendikon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=197865) on a [Forbidden Orchard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forbidden Orchard) for infinite mana.

posts.post_content:
My old *Intruder Alarm deck* ("standard" in Odyssey & Onslaught block and 8th Edition) was built around him, with the other center piece [Words of Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Words of Wind) and [Cryptic Gateway](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cryptic Gateway) (yes Ohms89, I agree!) . Other cards was: [Basking Rootwalla](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Basking Rootwalla), a totally free spell, [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves), [Aphetto Alchemist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aphetto Alchemist), [Krosan Restorer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Krosan Restorer), [Elvish Aberration](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Aberration) for some mana producing, [Merfolk Looter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Merfolk Looter), [Arcanis the Omnipotent](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcanis the Omnipotent), [Careful Study](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Careful Study), [Standstill](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Standstill) for drawing/discarding card (discarding the free Rootwalla, of course), the solid [Genesis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Genesis), and the very useful [Anger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Anger) (I don't forgot some Mountain in this green-blue deck!) to give haste at everybody.  
  
Not a competitive deck, but a funny one with friends... Intruder Alarm is one of my favorite non-b... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
My old Intruder Alarm deck ("standard" in Odyssey & Onslaught block and 8th Edition) was built around him, with the other center piece Words of Wind and Cryptic Gateway (yes Ohms89, I agree!) . Other cards was: Basking Rootwalla, a totally free spell, Llanowar Elves, Aphetto Alchemist, Krosan Restorer, Elvish Aberration for some mana producing, Merfolk Looter, Arcanis the Omnipotent, Careful Study, Standstill for drawing/discarding card (discarding the free Rootwalla, of course), the solid Genesis, and the very useful Anger (I don't forgot some Mountain in this green-blue deck!) to give haste at everybody.

Not a competitive deck, but a funny one with friends... Intruder Alarm is one of my favorite non-b... (see all)
